select
from person_register where 1=1 and is_deleted = 'N' and person_status = '1'
and DATE_ADD(in_time, INTERVAL delay_hour - 1 hour) < SYSDATE()

SELECT count(*) as cnt, DATE_FORMAT(in_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as in_time, DATE_FORMAT(in_time, '%w') as in_week FROM person_register WHERE 1=1 AND is_deleted = 'N'
AND DATE_FORMAT(in_time, '%Y-%m-%d') > DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(#{countDate,jdbcType=DATE}, '%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND DATE_FORMAT(in_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{countDate,jdbcType=DATE}, '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(in_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY in_time ASC

select count(*) as cnt, in_type from person_register where 1=1 and is_deleted = 'N'
and DATE_FORMAT(in_time, '%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(in_time, '%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y%m%d') group by in_type;

select count(*) as cnt, in_type from person_register where 1=1 and is_deleted = 'N'
and DATE_FORMAT(in_time, '%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT(in_time, '%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y%m%d') group by person_type;
